en-US.summary: Train yourself to become a skilled ninja master! Complete fun tasks and activities on your journey to leveling up in the ranks of Ninja School!
en-US.name: Ninja School
en-US.description:
Have you ever wanted to be a ninja? Come and join Ninja School! You will complete a series of tasks on your way to becoming a ninja master. Leap! Crawl! Spin! Be stealthy! As your skills progress you will climb the ranks and gain new titles! Begin your training today!

For the parents/guardians:
This skill will engage your child by providing them with fun and exciting tasks to complete on their path to becoming a Ninja Warrior! Tasks include physical activities and make-believe. As your child accomplishes more they will gain new ranks!
